content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Electricity group at position(x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when entities are out of fuel
  - Ensure that burner mining drills, burner inserters, and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply
* Errors when entities are not connected
  - Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electricity network
* Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
  - Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network
* Errors when entities are waiting for source items
  - Ensure that burner inserters have a source of items to insert
* Errors when entities have no ingredients
  - Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate
* Errors when pipe groups are empty
  - Ensure that pipe groups are connected to a source of fluid

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
